attributes.action: Investigate the spending of public funds
attributes.additional_details:
National rail
Banking system 
Royal mail

Nationalised, sold on, nationalised again. How many times can our money be spent when it could be spent better. £200 million to save a business and thousands of employees. Estimated £600 million to return our residents and make 9000 UK citizens unemployed.
attributes.background: With the collapse of Thomas Cook, Parliament should answer to the public on how they can allow a company to collapse when it could of been saved for a reduced amount of public money being spent.
